name: Outrun (itch) (Quelle)
description:
BIOGRAPHY

Hi, my name is Simone Parcon and I am currently a first year Bachelor of Creative Technologies student at MDS. This was the first game I’d ever created on Gamemaker, and though it may have a few bugs and glitches, I’m hoping it’s playable enough for you all to enjoy.

DESCRIPTION

In Outrun, you are an amateur cyborg hitman with one job. You brought a very loud shotgun, bright streetwear, and a pair of futuristic skates to help you move around quickly in case you get caught. Absolutely nothing could go wrong.

They’ve locked down the area and are waiting for your bright, glowing antlers to run right into their hands – except you won’t, you’ll skate right past them, into the exit.

KEY FEATURES

  • Skate right past enemies as you find your way to the exit
  • Shoot down whoever dares stand in the direction you happened to move towards with your shotgun
  • Unique enemy variants – Trackers, Brutes, Snipers and Guards
  • Avoid racing off into holes and ledges around the levels

PRICE, PLATFORM, RELEASE DATE

  • Free
  • Only on PC
  • Outrun is currently in a refined prototype stage that can be downloaded here, and no future plans have been considered yet for the game

CONTACT INFO

Twitter: @QueeenomiS

MUSIC

BGM and Menu music via https://www.FesliyanStudios.com
